ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?
ygData.msgSnippet: I play at 640x480, but then I also use a pair of LCD Shutter glasses to get some realistic depth perception.  Things look fabulous and the mind tends to do
ygData.messageBody:
I play at 640x480, but then I also use a pair of LCD Shutter glasses to get
some realistic depth perception. Things look fabulous and the mind tends to
do antialiasing which makes objects look even better at low resolution than
a high resolution without the glasses. If you ever get a chance to demo
some of these glasses, I highly recommend it.

Gilgurth
Bard of 21 Winces
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 12:56 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?


1240x1080 or whatever that resolution is

I have a 21" monitor that I play with.

So I'm a bit spoiled. Also I have no lag whatsoever switching between
windows (though it is annoying as hell that the inventory window is like 1/2
the size of my screen

I _never_ play at 640x480. The game just _looks_ much nicer at higher rez.
I also play full screen (with the overlays) because it's less distracting
than the gaming "window"

Kev
----- Original Message -----
From: "Sylly Songsynger" <jgs@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 1:29 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?


> From time to time I try other resolutions but have always come back to 640
x
> 480:
>
> a) 17" monitor helps
> b) dont like the lag when switching windows
> c) do like to open bags off the hot keys for switching stuff
> d) dont like the really small fonts in the high res text
>
> Sylly
>
> p.s. P3-500 256m ram, Voodoo 3 3000
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Adam Wasserman" <wassermana@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 12:25 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] What resolution do you all play at?
>
>
> I was playing with different resolutions last night and I was wondering
what
> resolution everyone plays with.
>
> I personally stick with 640 x 480 because I can't stand watching my
monitor
> switch resolutions when I switch to inventory or tracking mode.
>
> Draelon
>
